title: CSS

parsed_exercises.title: Change CSS Styles
parsed_exercises.description:
In the next page change the CSS styles performing the following changes:
- All three boxes should have a minimum height of 80px, use the class "box" and the property min-height to achieve this
- Change the background color of the first box to #ff704d
- Change the width of the second box to 300px
- Change the font color of the paragraph inside the second box to #d86a80
- Use the property font-size to change the font size of the h1 element to 48px
parsed_exercises.content:
Some boxes

This is the first box.
This is the second box.

With a yellow paragraph inside.

This is the third box.

parsed_exercises.title: Apply CSS
parsed_exercises.description:
This is the same page as in the previus test, but with different CSS selectors.
Change the HTML DOM so the new selectors apply.
